name: ORANGES CONTRAS
description: Relaxed fit shirt. Camp collar and short sleeves. Chest patch pocket. Contrast topstitching all over the garment. Button-up front.

name: WAVY PRINT SHIRT
description: Relaxed fit shirt made of a viscose and linen blend fabric. Camp collar and short sleeves. Chest patch pocket. Button-up front.

name: STRIPED KNIT SHIRT
description: Shirt made of spun cotton blend fabric. Featuring a camp collar and short sleeves. Button-up front.

name: ABSTRACT PRINT TEXTURED SHIRT
description: Relaxed fit shirt made of a creased effect fabric. Camp collar and short sleeves. Split hem. Button-up front.

name: GRAFFITI PRINT SHIRT
description: Regular fit shirt made of viscose fabric. Camp collar and short sleeves. Side vents at the hem. Button-up front.

name: COTTON JACKET WITH POCKETS
description: Collared cotton jacket. Featuring long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Patch pockets with flaps at the hip and a zip-up front.

name: DENIM EFFECT LEATHER JACKET
description: Collared leather jacket featuring long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Patch pockets on the front. Faded-effect. Button-up front.

name: LEATHER JACKET WITH POCKETS
description: Collared jacket made of leather with a nubuck finish. Featuring long sleeves, patch pockets with flaps at the hip, ribbed trims and a zip-up front.

name: CORDUROY PUFFER JACKET
description: Oversize jacket with an adjustable elasticated high neck and long sleeves. Zip pockets at the hip and interior pocket detail. Adjustable hem with elastic at the sides. Zip-up front.

name: SOFT QUILTED OVERSHIRT
description: Collared overshirt with a slightly quilted interior. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Chest patch pockets with flaps and hip welt pockets. Button-up front.

name: LINEN BLEND TROUSERS WITH TOPSTITCHING
description: Regular fit trousers made of a cotton and linen blend fabric. Adjustable elasticated waistband with drawstring. Front pockets and rear welt pocket detail. Contrast topstitching all over the garment. Adjustable elastic hems.

name: TEXTURED SUIT BLAZER
description: Slim-fit blazer with a notched lapel collar and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Welt pockets on the chest and at the hip. Inside pocket detail. Central back vent at the hem. Front button fastening.
